articles.author: Stewart Carr
articles.title: Angela Merkel lays wreath at Israel's national Holocaust memorial as she makes final official visit - Daily Mail
articles.description: Outgoing German Chancellor Angela Merkel made a stop at the memorial, Yad Vashem, today (Sunday) where she laid a wreath in memory of the six million European Jews killed by the Nazis.
articles.content:
Germany's outgoing Chancellor Angela Merkel received a warm welcome in Israel as she paid a final official visit to its national Holocaust memorial.

articles.title: Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babis Loses His Bid for Re-Election - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: The billionaire businessman had been at the forefront of a populist wave that swept Central Europe
articles.content:
Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babis lost his re-election bid on Saturday, a major upset against a billionaire businessman who had personified the rise of populist nationalism in Central Europe.

articles.description: The BepiColombo spacecraft – a joint project by the European and Japanese space agencies – swung by its destination planet Mercury in the early hours of October 2 2021.
